test_code_analysis: The tests verify the login functionality of the auth controller, covering successful login, invalid credentials, missing username, missing password, and internal server error scenarios.
The tests verify the authentication functionality in the LoginService class, covering scenarios of successful login, wrong password, account lockout, and nonexistent user.

The tests verify the functionality of the account lock controller's login endpoint, covering scenarios of successful login, invalid data, missing user_id or password, failed login due to wrong credentials, and handling exceptions during service calls.

The tests verify the functionality of the account lockout controller's login endpoint, checking for various scenarios such as successful login, account lockout, unauthorized attempts, and invalid data handling.

The tests verify the authentication functionality of AuthService, covering successful authentication, failures due to invalid passwords, non-existent users, empty credentials, and handling exceptions from the user repository.
